body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is George Gonzales and the customer's name is Judith Griffin.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. My name is George Gonzales. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi George, my name is Judith Griffin. I'm looking to buy a motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Judith! What type of motorcycle are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm not sure yet. I've been feeling a bit overwhelmed trying to pick the right one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand. It can be a big decision! May I ask how long you've been considering purchasing a motorcycle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've been thinking about it for about three months.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That’s a good amount of time to research! Can I also get your zip code to help find the best options available near you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Judith! One two three four five is noted. Lastly, could you provide me with your phone number so we can keep in touch?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that, Judith. I'll make sure to reach out with some options that fit your needs. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's everything for now. Thanks for your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time, Judith. Have a fantastic day, and I look forward to speaking with you soon!
